boardgame.name: Schiffbauer der Nordsee
Shipwrights of the North Sea
boardgame.description: Shipwrights of the North Sea is set in the early years of the Viking Age, circa 900 AD. As Viking shipwrights, players compete to build the greatest fleet on the North Sea. Players must collect oak, wool and iron, as well as getting other craftsmen on board to help. Gold is a precious commodity, and must be spent wisely. As you would expect, the township is filled with an array of characters, bad and worse. Better hope they're on your side!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Aim of the Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The aim of Shipwrights of the North Sea is to be the player with the most Victory Points at the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s end. Points are gained by constructing various Ships and Buildings. The game ends after the round where 1 or more players constructs their 4th ship._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gameplay Overview_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played over a series of days (rounds). Each day follows the same pattern:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Morning Phase - Planning (Each player receives 3 cards)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Afternoon Phase - Working (Players take actions and play or discard their 3 cards)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Evening Phase - Resting (Players receive Gold and Workers for the next day)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Printed Components_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;128 Cards - Featuring 46 unique and stunning illustrations_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Beautifully Illustrated Player Boards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Player Reference Boards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Illustrated Rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Pioneer Token_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 VP Markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wooden Components_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Gold Ships_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;25 Oak_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;25 Wool_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;25 Iron_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;50 Workers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

New in shrink, the Kickstarter version! Add 4% for PayPal, others must wait to clear. $20 S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H. MIGHT consider other countries, but S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H will at least double.

Game: Shipwrights of the North Sea (garphill games) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: English Kickstarter edition with artbook etc. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 spieleberatung@t-online.de

The game is still shrinkwrapped. I kickstarted this game, but after I received it and read the rules and reviews online I realized that this game is much better with more than 2-players. The majority of my game-playing is just my husband and me. Comes from a smoke-free home.

You are buying: AN IN-HAND, BRAND NEW, SEALED, 2014 KICKSTARTER EDITION WITH EXCLUSIVES, NOT EVEN IN STORES YET CARD GAME: Shipwrights of the North Sea GAME OVERVIEW: Shipwrights of the North Sea is set in the early years of the Viking Age, circa 900 AD. As Viking shipwrights, players compete to build the greatest fleet on the North Sea. Players must collect oak, wool and iron, as well as getting other craftsmen on board to help. Gold is a precious commodity, and must be spent wisely. As you would expect, the township is filled with an array of characters, bad and worse. Better hope they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re on your side! Aim of the Game The aim of Shipwrights of the North Sea is to be the player with the most Victory Points at the game’s end. Points are gained by constructing various Ships and Buildings. The game ends after the round where 1 or more players constructs their 4th ship. Gameplay Overview The game is played over a series of days (rounds). Each day follows the same pattern: Morning Phase - Planning (Each player receives 3 cards) Afternoon Phase - Working (Players take actions and play or discard their 3 cards) Evening Phase - Resting (Players receive Gold and Workers for the next day) Printed Components 128 Cards - Featuring 46 unique and stunning illustrations 5 Beautifully Illustrated Player Boards 5 Player Reference Boards 1 Illustrated Rulebook 1 Pioneer Token 5 VP Markers Wooden Components 5 Gold Ships 25 Oak 25 Wool 25 Iron 50 Workers Thank you for looking at my listing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Get your SHIPWRIGHTS OF THE NORTH SEA EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER EDITION now before its to late!!! Also please check out all my other Auctions and Buy-It-Nows and if you like what I sell then Follow Me on ebay: KICKSTARTEDGAMES I always put New Games on BGG and ebay frequently!
This is in excellent condition. Domestic shipping is $10. Shipping to Canada is $60 and other international locations is $75. I ALWAYS combine shipping for multiple purchases at +$1.
